overview_of_class: Applications of calculus and linear algebra to the solution of ordinary differential equations. Students may not receive credit for both 250 and 281-2, GEN ENG 205-4, or GEN ENG 206-4. Prerequisites: 230; 240 or concurrent registration in 240; or equivalent.
name: Elementary Differential Equations
title: WCAS MATH 250-0-31 Elementary Differential Equations

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Applications of calculus and linear algebra to the solution of ordinary differential equations. Students may not receive credit for both 250 and 281-2, GEN ENG 205-4, or GEN ENG 206-4. Prerequisites: 230; 240 or concurrent registration in 240; or equivalent.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: 230; 240 or concurrent registration in 240; or equivalent

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Three lectures and one quiz section per week.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: The student's grade in each quarter will be based on quizzes, midterm exams and a final exam

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Elementary Differential Equations, 10th Ed.
William Boyce & Richard DiPrima
Wiley
ISBN: 978-0470458327

descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 250 and 281-2, GEN ENG 205-4, or GEN ENG 206-4.
